text: Rebeca Margoth Espinosa Justavino (born 5 July 1992) is a Panamanian footballer who plays as a defender for the Panama women's national team. ==International career== Espinosa appeared in one match for Panama at the 2018 CONCACAF Women's Championship. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Panamanian women's footballers Category:Panama women's international footballers Category:Pan American Games competitors for Panama Category:Footballers at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Sol de América footballers Category:Panamanian expatriate footballers Category:Panamanian expatriate sportspeople in Paraguay Category:Expatriate women's footballers in Paraguay
title: Rebeca Espinosa
